ValueSet-Actors.title: WHO GDHCN Actor ValueSet of actor codes Schema
ValueSet-Actors.description: JSON Schema for WHO GDHCN Actor ValueSet of actor codes ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-Actors.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the WHO GDHCN Actor ValueSet of actor codes ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/trust/ValueSet-Actors.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
